title: Good Cop Dog Cop
description: A dog who’s a cop and wants to live out his greatest dream.
quote: I may be sweating like a dog, but I’m not rolling over!
altHero: arms hold up a goofy pug dressed in a cop’s uniform
alt1: a model cop car on a stick drives in front of a street backdrop
alt2: the pug has his paws on the steering wheel with fake sweat droplets on sticks near his face
alt3: the pug drives a car away from an explosion
alt4: a grumpy sock puppet with glasses and mustache
